name: Diana's lips
description: A cocktail based on mezcal infused with cocoa beans and pink berries, lime and Schweppes Tonic Hibiscus.

ingredients.ingredient: Mezcal infused with cocoa beans and pink berries

directions: Soak part of a tumbler glass in hibiscus powder.
Pour the mezcal infused with cocoa beans and pink berries.
Decorate your glass with slices of lime.
